alert.note: Alert for Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:34PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern West Feliciana and northwestern Pointe Coupee Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morganza, or near Melville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morganza and Batchelor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
